alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:32PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Limestone, southeastern Lauderdale, northwestern Morgan and northeastern Lawrence Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms near North Courtland to Hillsoboro, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Priceville, Trinity, Courtland, North Courtland, Hillsboro, Coxey, Oliver, Chalybeate Springs and Caddo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
